title: SELL EURUSD
name: GeminiWealthGroup
contents: Euro is at a very tight place right now. This phase is the accumulation phase. A lot of buyers have bought at this level and the previous low. However for the market to move upward it has to take out this liquidity first. I expect a downward momentum today and tomorrow. Mid of the month is when we should expect a trend change. Otherwise keep your targets at 0.9515 stops above 0.9730. Even if the news comes out bad for the dollar I still expect a push down.
Trade active

title: 12-10-2022 _ Update Short Term Bearish Idea _ AUDCHF Daily
name: ansfar
contents:
That‚Äôs an update on Short Term Bearish Idea _ AUDCHF Daily shared on 29-09-2022

1- The price action almost retraced to the Grey Support Zone as expected and then continued further lower towards 100% Fibo. Extension of the 2nd Wave.
2- In the due course of time it has also completed the Harmonic Pattern of AB=CD .
3- Since AB=CD pattern is almost complete; therefore, one can expect a pullback towards the support zone .

title: Ethereum: Bottom Price with Timeline (UPDATE)
name: MillionaireEconomics
contents:
Hello friends, today you can review the technical analysis on the 1M (monthly) linear scale chart for Ethereum ( ETHUSD ).

UPDATE FROM AUGUST 2022 CHART!

I placed vertical lines for the month of April from 2017-2025 to show up to now and in the future when price may start making major moves. The current structure looks very similar to 2018 and my prediction shows the same type of movement for Ethereum .

The concerning factor is the price has a significant downturn to go based on this chart scenario. Other concerns include low volume , bearish MACD , and RSI is below the support line.

The long-term looks positive for Ethereum as I see upside over $8K but price may need to get to around $200 before it goes higher. Hold on tight!

What are your opinions on this?

If you enjoy my ideas, feel free to like it and drop in a comment. I love reading your comments below.

Disclosure: This is just my opinion and not any type of financial advice. I enjoy charting and discussing technical analysis . Don't trade based on my advice. Do your own research! #millionaireeconomics

title: USDCHF Potential for Bullish Continuation | 13th October 2022
name: desmondlzw
contents:
We have a bullish bias on USDCHF on the H4 chart. Prices are trading above the Ichimoku cloud indicating a slightly bullish market. Looking for a break out buy entry at 0.9970 where the swing high,127.2% extension sits. The stop loss will be set at 0.9868, which is the previous low and the overlap support sits. Take profit will be at 1.0050, where the swing high is situated.
